answers.answer: Hello,It is very unusual for a sore to have such delayed healing. Delayed wound healing can occur in vitamin C and vit K deficiency,diabetes,p-rotein deficiency,immunocompromised states and if the person is taking corticosteroids or immunosuppressants. All these conditions need to be ruled out.Secondly you should get the scab biopsied to rule out any benign or malignant growth.It is very difficult to precisely confirm a diagnosis without examination and investigations and the answer is based on the medical information provided. For exact diagnosis, you are requested to consult your doctor. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and please do keep me posted on how you are doing.

question: I have a sore on my leg that I have had for a long time and it won't heal. My doctor checked it for cancer and gave me some cream to put on it, and it just scabs over, the scab falls off, and on and on.The skin on my leg is very shiny, and it peels. I am a female, 58 years old.
title: leg sore
